MAIN_Config::insertPlugin ( $  name,
$  filename 
)

Helper function to insert plugins. Inserts the options of the given plugin configuration filename under the plugin_$name key in the global configuration.

Parameters:
string $name Base name for the plugin
string $filename Full filename for the config file
Returns:
bool True on success, false on failure
